unnormalised: Arey yaar, hi copyright-achi vostu GST-peksha vhoddli dokedukh zalea! Mhozo ixtt Suresh-an ekdom boro meme toyar kelo, bara? To Instagram-ar post kelo. Atam konnachi tori vhoddli company to tanchya advertisement-ak vaparta! Adv. Sharma mhonta ami case kortolim mhunn, punn case bhortali mhonnllear meme toyar korche peksha chodd kaam dista. normalised: Arrey yaar, hea copyright-achi gozal G-S-T sodhun kaddnche porosui vhoddli dukhi! Mhozo ixtt Suresh-an ekdom mast meme toyar kelem, bare? Insta-cher post kelem. Atam konn-i vhodd company tem tankam ad-ak vaporta! Advocate Sharma sangta ami case file kortale, punn case file korop meme toyar korche porosui chodd kam disonam. Intellectual property, mhonnlear lawyer-ichi fees bhortokoch intellectual poverty zata, hai na? Tannem fokot panch hazar rupe ani jivit bhor somose divonk sangonk favo aslem. Kitem korchem, boss?
